blogPost.excerpt: We have you covered as you jingle all the way from your bed to the living room. Dress up your festivities with animated, illustrated, or traditional Christmas video backgrounds by Icons8.
blogPost.body: We have you covered as you jingle all the way from your bed to the living room. Dress up your festivities with animated, illustrated, or traditional Christmas video backgrounds by Icons8.
blogPost.title: Christmas Zoom Backgrounds - Delightful animations and virtual backgrounds for gatherings
blogPost.author: Ivan

localize.description: 当您从床到起居室叮当作响时，我们会掩护您的。用Icons8的动画、插图或传统圣诞视频背景来装扮你的庆祝活动。

localize.description: 當您從牀到起居室叮噹作響時，我們會掩護您的。用Icons8的動畫、插圖或傳統聖誕視頻背景來裝扮你的慶祝活動。

previous.excerpt: Momento provide a powerful tool to help you manage your domains and SSL certificates to prevent you from forgetting. With Momento you can renew your domains, manage your DNS and buy new domains from all your registrars. Everything in one place.
previous.title: Momento - A powerful platform to help you manage your domains

localize.description: 时刻提供一个强大的工具来帮助您管理您的域和SSL证书，以防止您忘记。使用MOMENTO，您可以续订您的域名，管理您的DNS，并从您的所有注册商购买新的域名。所有东西都放在一个地方。
localize.tagline: 一个功能强大的平台，可帮助您管理您的域

localize.description: 時刻提供一個強大的工具來幫助您管理您的域和SSL證書，以防止您忘記。使用MOMENTO，您可以續訂您的域名，管理您的DNS，並從您的所有註冊商購買新的域名。所有東西都放在一個地方。
localize.tagline: 一個功能強大的平臺，可幫助您管理您的域
